header_text: You have a minor disagreement with a coworker about the best way to complete a task, and you decide to ask your boss about it. When you talk to your boss, you momentarily forget what you were about to say. Your boss thinks you sound calm.

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
